Comment: >In a Republican-held New Jersey district, Khanna headlined a town hall April 21 that drew out a crowd of discontented liberals. He fielded two and a half hours' worth of questions, outlasting the majority of people who came out to hear from him.  >The event was part of Khanna's ongoing national tour dubbed "Benefits over Billionaires," which takes aim at Trump, the president's uber wealthy adviser Elon Musk and the Republicans who represent the areas Khanna is visiting. Monday’s appearance in New Jersey's 7th Congressional District was Khanna’s fourth stop in the town hall series and the first outside his home state of California.
Author: ThistleroseTea

Comment: >While the minority party has little room to move in Washington, prominent Democrats like Khanna are crisscrossing the country claiming they're filling a void left by GOP lawmakers, who have scaled back events due to Donald Trump-fueled clashes with constituents.  >Sen. Bernie Sanders, Vermont’s gruff independent, and Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez, his progressive protégé from New York, just wrapped up their highly attended “Fighting Oligarchy” tour. Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz has appeared on stages from Iowa to Texas to address auditoriums of red and swing district voters.  * [Gov. Tim Walz pledges to protect Minnesota from the 'chaos' he says Trump unleashed](https://abcnews.go.com/Politics/wireStory/gov-tim-walz-pledges-protect-minnesota-chaos-trump-121108696)   * [Tim Walz - ”If you say you love freedom but you don't believe freedom is for everybody, then the thing you love is not freedom, it is privilege.“](https://old.reddit.com/r/minnesota/comments/1k6f3i7/tim_walz_if_you_say_you_love_freedom_but_you_dont/)  * [Sanders and Ocasio-Cortez Electrify Democrats Who Want to Fight Trump](https://www.nytimes.com/2025/04/16/us/politics/bernie-sanders-aoc-trump-democrats.html)   * [Thousands rally in Missoula for Bernie Sanders, AOC](https://montanafreepress.org/2025/04/16/thousands-rally-in-missoula-for-bernie-sanders-aoc/)   * [AOC seizes the moment as Dems seek a new identity](https://www.axios.com/2025/04/21/aoc-bernie-sanders-progressives-democrats)   * [The Bernie Sanders tour puts California GOP on notice](https://rollcall.com/2025/04/22/the-bernie-sanders-tour-puts-california-gop-on-notice/)  * [I[, Ro Khanna] held three town halls in GOP districts. I heard one question over and over again. — Republicans are cancelling town halls in their districts. I’m a Democrat and I went to find out what those voters would like to say to their elected officials.](https://www.msnbc.com/opinion/msnbc-opinion/ro-khanna-gop-representatives-keep-canceling-town-halls-owe-constituen-rcna197796)  * [Chris Van Hollen Shows Us One Person Can Make a Difference](https://www.thenation.com/article/politics/chris-van-hollen-kilmar-abrego-garcia/)   * [Van Hollen does a ‘full Ginsburg’; more Democrats head to El Salvador, and a Republican, too](https://marylandmatters.org/2025/04/23/notes-van-hollen-abrego-garcia/)  * [Members of Congress Visit Graduate Students Being Held in Louisiana —  Five Democrats met with Mahmoud Khalil and Rumeysa Ozturk, who face deportation by the Trump administration.](https://www.nytimes.com/2025/04/22/us/politics/mahmoud-khalil-rumeysa-ozturk-democrats.html)  * [Cory Booker’s long speech offers a strategy for Trump opponents in a fragmented media landscape](https://theconversation.com/cory-bookers-long-speech-offers-a-strategy-for-trump-opponents-in-a-fragmented-media-landscape-253911)  * [Chris Murphy Emerges as a Clear Voice for Democrats Countering Trump — The third-term senator from Connecticut is eschewing caution and throwing out the traditional political playbook as he seeks a broader audience for his critiques of the president and his agenda.](https://www.nytimes.com/2025/02/23/us/politics/chris-murphy-democrats-trump.html)  * [Maine Governor, Staring Down Trump, Says She Is Unfazed by ‘Loud Men’](https://www.nytimes.com/2025/04/10/us/janet-mills-donald-trump-maine.html)  * [JB Pritzker burnishes his national brand as one of Trump’s fiercest critics](https://www.politico.com/news/2025/04/20/pritzker-tktktk-00296824)   * [Illinois Gov. JB Pritzker takes steps to boycott El Salvador in protest of Kilmar Abrego Garcia's detention](https://www.nbcnews.com/politics/politics-news/illinois-gov-jb-pritzker-takes-steps-boycott-el-salvador-protest-kilma-rcna202720)  * [Why Austin’s Progressive Rep. Greg Casar Is Visiting Republican Districts](https://www.austinchronicle.com/news/2025-04-25/why-austins-progressive-rep-greg-casar-is-visiting-republican-districts/)  We need more [outdoor Democrats](https://www.politico.com/news/magazine/2025/04/20/democrats-strategy-bernie-sanders-aoc-00299416) than indoor ones.
Author: brain_overclocked
